title: Dynamic Queue Negatively impacting games.
body: I recently played in a ranked match on my own where everyone in my team was queued alone. Our opponent had a group of 3 people. It was obvious there were voice comms communication. How is this even remotely fair? For reference the queue was 10 mins long. Is anyone else experiencing this type of thing?

replies.body: It's not fair and Riot don't give a f*ck...just stfu give them your money and play.
Bring in in game voice comms, Let the toxicity begin
